oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Interview with Maḥmūd al-Bāyir and Șālih Rashīd
مقابلة مع محمود الباير و صالح رشيد
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Arabic fiction--Palestine
Praise of God--Prayers and devotions
Folk poetry, Arabic--Palestine
ʻAtābā--Palestine
oai_dc:dc.dc:otherSubject: al-Ṣuwayṭāt (Arab tribe); Arab tribes; Children; Cousins; Folk music; Loved ones; Maliciousness; Marriage; Mothers; Pilgrims; Princes; Rabāb; Tarshīḥā (Palestine); Weddings; Witnesses; Wives; ʻAtābā; Folk music; Folk poetry; Rabāb; Wedding celebration; Wives; Work; Folk music; Mawwāl; Rabāb; Folk music; Hunting practices; Love poetry; Rabāb; Revolutionary songs; Shootings; Sons; Forgiveness; Mercy; Muḥammad, Prophet, –632
oai_dc:dc.dc:biography: The interview was recorded on November 13, 1995 with Maḥmūd al-Bāyir, male, born in 1936 in Tarshīḥā, Palestine and resides in Shabrīḥah, Lebanon. The interview was also recorded with Șālih Rashīd, male, born in 1934 in Dayr al-Asad, Palestine and resides in Jal al-baḥ, Tyre, Lebanon.
oai_dc:dc.dc:biographyAR: سجلت المقابلة مع محمود الباير في 13 تشرين الثاني نوفمبر عام 1995، ذكر, ولد عام 1936 في ترشيحا, فلسطين و يقبم في شبريحة, لبنان. سجلت المقابلة أيضا مع صالح رشيد, ذكر, ولد عام 1934 في دير الأسد, فلسطين ويقيم في جل البحر، صور، لبنان.
oai_dc:dc.dc:toc: Story of Bishr and Husn I. (@ 0:00)
Story of Bishr and Husn II. (@ 26:59)
Prayers to God and religious anthems. (@ 80:51)
